com.azure.android.storage.blob

Class StorageBlobClient.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.azure.android.storage.blob.StorageBlobClient.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    StorageBlobClient

    public static class StorageBlobClient.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder to configure and build a StorageBlobClient.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Builder

        public Builder(java.lang.String storageBlobClientId)
        Creates a StorageBlobClient.Builder.
        Parameters:
        storageBlobClientId - The unique ID for the StorageBlobClient this builder builds. This identifier is used to associate this StorageBlobClient with the upload and download transfers it initiates. When a transfer is reloaded from disk (e.g. after an application crash), it can only be resumed once a client with the same storageBlobClientId has been initialized.

      • Builder

        public Builder(java.lang.String storageBlobClientId,
               com.azure.android.core.http.ServiceClient.Builder serviceClientBuilder)
        Creates a StorageBlobClient.Builder that uses the provided ServiceClient.Builder to build a ServiceClient for the StorageBlobClient.

        The builder produced ServiceClient is used by the StorageBlobClient to make Rest API calls. Multiple StorageBlobClient instances can share the same ServiceClient instance, for e.g. when a new StorageBlobClient is created from an existing StorageBlobClient through StorageBlobClient.newBuilder(String) ()} then both shares the same ServiceClient. The ServiceClient composes HttpClient, HTTP settings (such as connection timeout, interceptors) and Retrofit for Rest calls.

        Parameters:
        storageBlobClientId - The unique ID for the StorageBlobClient this builder builds.
        serviceClientBuilder - The ServiceClient.Builder.

    • Method Detail

      • setBlobServiceUrl

        public StorageBlobClient.Builder setBlobServiceUrl(java.lang.String blobServiceUrl)
        Sets the base URL for the StorageBlobClient.
        Parameters:
        blobServiceUrl - The blob service base URL.
        Returns:
        An updated StorageBlobClient.Builder with the provided blob service URL set.

      • setCredentialInterceptor

        public StorageBlobClient.Builder setCredentialInterceptor(okhttp3.Interceptor credentialInterceptor)
        Sets an interceptor used to authenticate the blob service request.
        Parameters:
        credentialInterceptor - The credential interceptor.
        Returns:
        An updated StorageBlobClient.Builder with the provided credentials interceptor set.

      • setRequiresCharging

        public StorageBlobClient.Builder setRequiresCharging(boolean requiresCharging)
        Sets whether device should be charging for running the transfers. The default value is false.
        Parameters:
        requiresCharging - true if the device must be charging for the transfer to run.
        Returns:
        An updated StorageBlobClient.Builder with the provided charging requirement set.

      • setRequiresDeviceIdle

        public StorageBlobClient.Builder setRequiresDeviceIdle(boolean requiresDeviceIdle)
        Sets whether device should be idle for running the transfers. The default value is false.
        Parameters:
        requiresDeviceIdle - true if the device must be idle for transfers to run.
        Returns:
        An updated StorageBlobClient.Builder with the provided setting set.

      • setRequiredNetworkType

        public StorageBlobClient.Builder setRequiredNetworkType(@NonNull
                                                        androidx.work.NetworkType networkType)
        Sets the particular NetworkType the device should be in for running the transfers.

        The default network type that StorageBlobClient uses is NetworkType.CONNECTED.

        Parameters:
        networkType - The type of network required for transfers to run.
        Returns:
        An updated StorageBlobClient.Builder with the provided network type set.

      • setRequiresBatteryNotLow

        public StorageBlobClient.Builder setRequiresBatteryNotLow(boolean requiresBatteryNotLow)
        Sets whether device battery should be at an acceptable level for running the transfers. The default value is false.
        Parameters:
        requiresBatteryNotLow - true if the battery should be at an acceptable level for the transfers to run.
        Returns:
        An updated StorageBlobClient.Builder with the provided battery requirement set.

      • setRequiresStorageNotLow

        public StorageBlobClient.Builder setRequiresStorageNotLow(boolean requiresStorageNotLow)
        Sets whether the device's available storage should be at an acceptable level for running the transfers. The default value is false.
        Parameters:
        requiresStorageNotLow - true if the available storage should not be below a a critical threshold for the transfer to run.
        Returns:
        An updated StorageBlobClient.Builder with the provided storage requirement set.

      • build

        public StorageBlobClient build()
        Builds a StorageBlobClient based on this StorageBlobClient.Builder's configuration.
        Returns:
        A StorageBlobClient.
